_description: Copy this file to .claude/settings.local.json to bootstrap Claude Code guardrails for the SDD Toolkit.

permissions._description: Buckets that control how Claude can invoke skills, CLI commands, and filesystem operations.
permissions._allow_description: Always-on permissions that unblock core SDD workflows.
permissions._ask_description: Operations that require an explicit user approval in the IDE.
permissions._deny_description: Operations that remain disallowed even when requested.
